resources.string: The maximum amount of health for a unit in a unit.
The defensive soldier’s armor value is subtracted from the attacker's damage.
The amount of base damage that a soldier will inflict on an enemy. This damage can be blocked by the armor of the defending soldier.
The number of the special part of the damage the soldier will inflict on the enemy. This damage cannot be blocked by armor.
A soldier’s ability to attack. In fact, the probability of a successful strike on a non-defending goal.
A soldier’s ability to defend himself. In fact, the probability of successful repelling the strike that was supposed to hit the soldier.
Half the sector ahead of the soldier in which he can successfully defend himself.

The probability of successfully blocking the projectile. It should be borne in mind that shit blocks shells only in frontal shelling. In addition, if the shields are not raised, their block chance is halved. Displays the value for the front fire.
The maximum distance a soldier can inflict damage on an enemy.
The maximum speed of movement of the soldiers in the unit.
The speed of a soldier turning around its axis in degrees.

Onslaught Force. The greater this value, the higher the chance to inflict damage to the enemy and throw it back when there is an onslaught. A reflection of the onslaught of the defending soldier is subtracted from the onslaught of the attacking soldier.

Reflection of the onslaught. The greater this value, the higher the chance to repel damage to the enemy and throw it back, when the enemy attacks. A reflection of the onslaught of the defending soldier is subtracted from the onslaught of the attacking soldier.
An additional percentage of the soldier’s attack that will be inflicted upon a successful onslaught attack.
Different terrain has a different effect on units of different severity. Be careful, the terrain can both give you an advantage or become your burial site.
